casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. HARRIS
v.
RUBINO 2018-1129 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 30, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In Mandamus. Review of relator's reply brief reveals that it fails to comply with S.Ct.Prac.R. 16.04(B)(1). Sua sponte, pages 21 through 28 of the reply brief are stricken, as they are in excess of the 20-page limit imposed on content for a reply brief.
